original_title: Osmar, a Primeira Fatia do Pão de Forma
overview: A first slice of a loaf of bread arrives in the big city trying to get fame and overcome the fact that it was left on the packaging. Between fermented egos artists and audience disputes, the insecure Osmar emerges as an unexpected celebrity in the television world.
title: Osmar, The First Slice of the Loaf
